mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
WHERE CT_CODE = #{categoryNo}

SELECT A.PD_NO, A.PD_NAME, A.ORIGIN_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT, A.SELL_PRICE, A.VOLUME, A.SUB_EX, A.DRUG_WAY, A.SHELFLIFE, A.RECOMEND, A.CT_CODE, A.PD_COUNT, A.PD_UPLOADDATE, B.CT_NAME, C.PDP_NO, C.PDP_RENAME, C.PDP_FILEPATH, C.PDP_TYPE FROM PRODUCT A JOIN PCATEGORY B ON A.CT_CODE = B.CT_CODE JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO C ON A.PD_NO = C.PD_NO WHERE C.PDP_TYPE = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT ROWNUM, F.* FROM (SELECT A.PD_NO, B.PDP_RENAME, A.PD_NAME, A.SELL_PRICE FROM PRODUCT A JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO B ON A.PD_NO = B.PD_NO WHERE PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND B.PDP_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY (RECOMEND * 5) + (PD_COUNT) DESC) F
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT A.PD_NO, A.PD_NAME, A.ORIGIN_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT, A.SELL_PRICE, A.VOLUME, A.SUB_EX, A.DRUG_WAY, A.SHELFLIFE, A.RECOMEND, A.CT_CODE, A.PD_COUNT, A.PD_UPLOADDATE, B.CT_NAME, C.PDP_NO, C.PDP_RENAME, C.PDP_FILEPATH, C.PDP_TYPE FROM PRODUCT A JOIN PCATEGORY B ON A.CT_CODE = B.CT_CODE JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO C ON A.PD_NO = C.PD_NO WHERE C.PDP_TYPE = 0 AND A.PD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT A.PD_NO, A.PD_NAME, A.ORIGIN_PRICE, A.SELL_PRICE, A.VOLUME, A.SUB_EX, A.DRUG_WAY, A.SHELFLIFE, A.RECOMEND, A.CT_CODE, A.PD_COUNT, B.CT_NAME FROM PRODUCT A JOIN PCATEGORY B ON A.CT_CODE = B.CT_CODE WHERE A.PD_NO = #{pdNo}
SELECT PDP_RENAME FROM PRODUCTPHOTO WHERE PD_NO = #{pdNo} ORDER BY PDP_TYPE ASC

SELECT B.PDREVIEW_NO, B.PDREVIEW_CONTENT, B.DR_NO, G.DR_NAME, B.C_NO, H.C_NICKNAME, B.PDR_SUBMITDATE, I.PRO_RENAME AS "CLIENT_PROFILE", J.PRO_RENAME AS "DR_PROFILE" FROM PRODUCTREVIEW B LEFT JOIN DRCLIENT G ON G.DR_NO = B.DR_NO LEFT JOIN CLIENT H ON H.C_NO = B.C_NO LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO I ON B.C_NO = I.C_NO LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO J ON B.DR_NO = J.DR_NO WHERE B.PD_NO = #{pdNo} ORDER BY B.PDR_SUBMITDATE DESC

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, TB.* FROM (SELECT F.PDQ_NO, F.PDQ_TITLE, F.PDQ_CONTENT, F.PDQ_SUBMITDATE, F.PDQ_ANSWERSTATUS, F.DR_NO, I.DR_NAME, F.C_NO, J.C_NICKNAME, F.SECRETSTATUS, F.PDQ_ANSWERCONTENT FROM PRODUCTQNA F LEFT JOIN DRCLIENT I ON I.DR_NO = F.DR_NO LEFT JOIN CLIENT J ON J.C_NO = F.C_NO WHERE F.PD_NO = #{pdNo} ORDER BY PDQ_SUBMITDATE DESC) TB

SELECT D.DRRM_NO, D.DRRM_COMMENT, D.DR_NO, K.DR_NAME, K.HP_NO, P.PRO_RENAME, D.DRRM_SUBMITDATE FROM DRRECOMMEND D JOIN DRCLIENT K ON K.DR_NO = D.DR_NO LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO P ON P.DR_NO = D.DR_NO WHERE D.PD_NO = #{pdNo} ORDER BY DRRM_SUBMITDATE DESC
SELECT PDQ_TITLE, PDQ_CONTENT, PDQ_ANSWERSTATUS, PDQ_ANSWERCONTENT, SECRETPASSWORD FROM PRODUCTQNA WHERE PDQ_NO = #{pdqNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTQNA VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCTQNA.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', NULL, #{pdNo}, #{cNo}, #{drNo}, #{secretStatus}, #{secretPwd} )
